name: Energy Orb
description: Project a globe of regeneration that slowly floats forward, healing for 493 Health every 1 second to you and nearby allies.  An ally near the globe can activate the Healing Combustion synergy, causing the orb to explode and heal for 2249 Health to nearby allies and restoring 3960 Magicka or Stamina to the activator, whichever maximum is higher.
effectLines: The orb heals allies instead of damaging enemies.
coefDescription: Project a globe of regeneration that slowly floats forward, healing for $1 Health every 1 second to you and nearby allies.  An ally near the globe can activate the Healing Combustion synergy, causing the orb to explode and heal for $2 Health to nearby allies and restoring 3960 Magicka or Stamina to the activator, whichever maximum is higher.
rawDescription:
Project a globe of regeneration that slowly floats forward, healing for <<1>> Health every <<2>> to you and nearby allies.

An ally near the globe can activate the <<3>> synergy, causing the orb to explode and heal for <<4>> Health to nearby allies and restoring <<5>> Magicka or Stamina to the activator, whichever maximum is higher.
